enb_long_title: UNFCCC Expert Group Meeting on socioeconomic information under the Nairobi Work Programme on Impacts, Vulnerability and Adaptation to Climate Change (NWP)
sentences: The subgroup on health discussed the need for spatially explicit data, including on: poverty, demographics, and water and sanitation needs.
He highlighted the benefits of disaggregated, spatially located, high-resolution data.
The Cook Islands highlighted opportunities to link with other agencies with common interests, most notably the Red Cross.
